description:
Bosom Buddies Breast Cancer Support Group offers physical, emotional, and educational support for women battling breast cancer and/or lymphedema. They also provide direct connections to physicians and other professionals in related fields.

name: BOSOM BUDDIES BREAST CANCER SUPPORT GROUP, INC.
